infos.title: Arrow of Purity
infos.story: An Angel warrior who descended from the Heavens to punish the Demons and stop the spread of chaos on earth. His delegated tasks include scouting, reconnaissance, and execution of any Demons found on earth. He has a strong sense of responsibility and is quick and decisive against any injustice. He truly loves Mankind and all the lelife forms that inhabit the earth. This is why he strives to prevent the Demons from defiling this world.

uw.name: Clear Blue Sky, Sherrkyle
uw.description: Every 10 sec, inflicts a Judgement Sigil on 1 random enemy for 15 sec, then deals M.DMG equal to (0) of ATK, Ignores DEF if the target is not a Hero.
uw.story: A powerful weapon of light that can take the form of a spear, a dagger, or a bow. One of the divine treasures of the Angels blessed by an archangel. It is said to be capable of incinerating evil. Due to its versatility, it has traditionally been given to the most talented scout. The number of Demons who perished under its light during the war is too high to count.

1.name: Holy Golden Arrow
1.description: [Celestial Arrow] Increases DMG by (0) and the number of targets by 1.
1.story: A golden arrow created by the divine power of Arch. It summons and materializes the purest and holiest light from heaven, its power increasing according to the amount of divine power given to it. For the good of heart, it's merely a beautiful scene to watch, but if evil creatures are shot by it, they become mutilated and slammed into some non-material dimension.

2.name: Magic Square of Pursuit
2.description: [Purifying Blaze] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by (0).
2.story: The symbol of Fire Arbiter Army that fought a fierce battle against Ancient Demons. When using the Magic Square of Pursuit blessed by Lua, the Goddess of Light, Arch becomes a merciless arbiter.

3.name: Eye of Heaven
3.description: [Arbiter] DMG is increased by (0) and all allies' ATK is increased by 30% for the duration of M.Shield.
3.story: Angel Arbiter Pilier's soul egg. Pilier was born from Lua's first flame, and is Arch's master. Pilier was the best Angel warrior and was the one to end the war against the Demons. But after using all of his power, he went back to being an Eye of Heaven, which is the soul egg form, and Arch is holding onto his master's soul.

4.name: Bell of Punishment
4.description: [The Last Judgment] Upon receiving fatal DMG, heals HP of all allies by 15% of Max HP, and silences entire enemies for (0) sec.
4.story: A heavenly bell that rings in the morning star. The bell rings to warn the Angel warriors whenever the earth faces great trouble, letting them know that divine punishment will be needed. Upon hearing the bell, warriors realize that the time has come for them to slit the throats of the bringers of apocalypse under Lua's name.

sw.story:
Sherrkyle is a strong weapon of light which is also a treasure of angels, blessed by the archangel. With Arch as its master, it purged Demons and wicked beings that tainted the world.
Arch was a cold vanquisher, and sherrkyle also shared its master's trait.

However, after descending to the world, Arch started to change slowly.
As he watched the humans and lifeforms of the world, Arch slowly began to develop the feeling of love and mercy. Eventually, he recognized the warmth that was blooming inside his heart.

Influenced by his master's change of heart, Sherrkyle also started to change.
From the weapon of a cold, resolute vanquisher to the weapon of the protector of the world.

Finally when Arch made his descent to save lives from danger, Sherrkyle shined ever-bright and awakened in the form of a guardian. Arch's will to protect others has awakened the great guardian.
